next_state: -= Kitchen =- You arrive in a kitchen. An usual kind of place. You see an opened fridge right there by you. The fridge contains a fried yellow bell pepper, a red onion, a yellow onion, a red bell pepper, a raw red tuna and a cilantro. You can see an oven. Look out! It's a- oh, never mind, it's just a table. Why don't you take a picture of it, it'll last longer! You see a knife on the table. You can make out a counter. The counter is vast. On the counter you can make out a fried red potato, a green apple, a red apple, a raw purple potato, a banana and a cookbook. You can see a stove. The stove is conventional. But the thing hasn't got anything on it. This always happens, here in TextWorld! There is an open plain door leading west. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, there is no door. > -= Kitchen =-0/10

admissible_commands: take red bell pepper from fridge
